amendment.description: To provide for the application of stronger civil penalties for violations of approved risk evaluation and mitigation strategies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 998 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 30. Record Vote Number: 155.

action.text: Amendment SA 998 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S5705-5706; text: CR S5705) To provide for the application of stronger civil penalties for violations of approved risk evaluation and mitigation strategies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 998 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 30. Record Vote Number: 155.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 998 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Grassley.
